title: Information Fluency-Based Social Studies Information Literacy Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A blended course designed for pre-service and in-service teachers to apply information fluency pedagogy in social studies, aiming to strengthen competencies in information evaluation, utilization, and ethics in digital environments.

learning_goals: Develop at least three information source evaluation criteria suitable for social studies contexts
Complete at least one team-based PBL lesson design incorporating information fluency pedagogy
